org.forgerock.openam.session.stateless.cache

Class StatelessJWTCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.session.stateless.cache.StatelessJWTCache

  • @Singleton
public class StatelessJWTCache
extends Object
    Responsible for providing a caching layer for JWT/SessionInfo conversion. This cache acts as a performance enhancement which will reduce the number of times JWT tokens need to be decrypted and decoded. This cache is intentionally unable to perform the reverse lookup of SessionInfo to JWT, as we expect the JWT to change each time the SessionInfo changes. Assumption: There is only one representation of a JWT to the SessionInfo it contains. Thread Safety: This class uses a synchronized data structure and so is thread safe.
